title: How can Riot say...
body:
{{champion:110}}  is a valid champion (strong enough) when {{champion:429}} exists?

also why not limit the damage Kalista's Rend can do to monsters like you do with most other champions abilties. (i'd say limit it to 700 so she can be outsmited atleast at later levels)

replies.body:
I am bothered by the lack of a damage cap on monsters, but I don't think she is OP like everyone says.
Its all in her passive, which can't be used if you use like... ANY CC on her except for slows.
If all the CC you have on your team is slows, you have a bad team comp to fight Kalista.
with her e yeah I agree needs a cap on monsters but just play rengar ult snare dead kalista
